package.name: FileZilla
package.build: export PATH=/usr/compat.new/bin:$PATH cd filezilla-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 2 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --enable-shared --disable-static --prefix=/opt --sysconfdir=/etc \ --with-tinyxml=builtin --with-wx-config=/usr/compat.new/bin/wx-config --with-pugixml=builtin \ CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else ./configure --enable-shared --disable-static --prefix=/opt --sysconfdir=/etc \ --with-tinyxml=builtin --with-wx-config=/usr/compat.new/bin/wx-config --with-pugixml=builtin make -j3 fi
package.install:
cd filezilla-${PKGVERSION} make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin paxctl -m ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin/filezilla
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/filezilla cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/filezilla << FZRUN #!/bin/sh
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec /opt/bin/filezilla \$@ exec sudo /opt/bin/filezilla_smack \$@
FZRUN
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin/filezilla_smack cat >> ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin/filezilla_smack << FZSMACK #!/static/bin/ash
/static/sbin/newsmack internet /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/bin/filezilla \$@"
FZSMACK
chmod 0755 ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/filezilla chmod 0755 ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin/filezilla_smack
